name: AquaCrea
description:
In a sealed water park... Nothing is like what you think, you can't know what you will encounter there. 

There can be some creatures that consist of the water park or someone who you want to help. Together, you can restore Gates Water Park.

CREDITS 

Code: Arefnue, Sagynbek Kenzhebaev

Art: Alara Ciloglu, Kutay Sert, Berfu Cete, Yamanefe Ugurlu, Eda Deniz

Sound: Yamanefe Ugurlu, Sagynbek Kenzhebaev

Story: Eda Deniz
